name: Collect The Cheesecake
description:
Update: Map starts unexplored and you need to find an axe to cut down trees.

A small Prototype for the Miz Jam game jam, using the Kenny Bit Pack.  Can you collect all the pieces of Cheesecake before anyone else?

Controls are WASD or arrow keys.

I haven't spent much time developing this so I might come back to improve it before the deadline.
